Producer: Mike Gabrawy, Gary Hamilton, Chen Sylen Hwa, Sheldon Pang
Production Co: Kungfuman Culture Media, Aurora Alliance Films, Hamilton Entertainment
Synopsis: A crime syndicate places a hit on a billionaire's daughter, making her the target of an elite assassin squad. A small band of down-and-out mercenaries protects her, fighting tooth and nail to stop the assassins from reaching their target.
Title: Triple Threat
